schemes.title: Distribution of free house sites to Scheduled Caste/Other Economically Backward Classes
schemes.description: To provide free house sites to homeless poor Scheduled Caste people and other Economically backward class people at the ratio of 80:20 to enable them to construct their own houses.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Scheduled Caste, Other Economically Backward Classes

procedures.step_description: Apply with proof of identity, caste/income/residence-cum-nativity certificate.

schemes.title: Grant of House Construction Subsidy to Scheduled Caste people
schemes.description: Subsidy to poor houseless Scheduled Caste/Other Economically Backward class people to construct house.

procedures.step_description: Apply with proof of identity, caste/income/residence-cum-nativity certificate, and original Patta document.

schemes.title: Grant of financial assistance to poor S.C. pregnant & lactating women
schemes.description: Financial Assistance to poor pregnant women and Lactating Scheduled Caste women.

criteria.description: Applicant must be of Scheduled Caste, residing in Puducherry for at least 3 years.
Annual income of the applicant and spouse should not exceed Rs. 200000/-
Application should be made from 6 months of pregnancy and within 3 months from the date of delivery.
Financial assistance is available only for 2 deliveries.

procedures.step_description: Apply with Aadhar card, discharge summary/birth certificate, and certificate from the Medical Superintendent.
